mapper.insert: insert into complains(complainsid , usersid , contents , addtime , status , reps ) values(#{complainsid} , #{usersid} , #{contents} , #{addtime} , #{status} , #{reps} )
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username from complains a , users b where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid order by complainsid desc
select a.* , b.username from complains a , users b where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and complainsid=#{complainsid} order by complainsid desc

select a.* , b.username from complains a , users b where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid
and a.usersid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.status like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{status}, '%'))
and a.reps like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{reps}, '%'))
